actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no portion of a Federal estate tax liability may be assessed or collected if an appellate administrative conference has been requested with respect to any portion of such liability and such conference is not commenced within 90 days after such request.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that no portion of a Federal estate tax liability may be assessed or collected if an appellate administrative conference has been requested with respect to any portion of such liability and such conference is not commenced within 90 days after such request.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no portion of a Federal estate tax liability may be assessed or collected if an appellate administrative conference has been requested with respect to any portion of such liability and such conference is not commenced within 90 days after such request.
